traits.name: Medium Size
traits.description: Medium creatures vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to over 8 feet tall.

traits.name: Small Size
traits.description: Small creatures are short and light, often shorter than 4 feet tall and less than 80 pounds.

sizeTraits.name: Size Traits
sizeTraits.description: Additional traits based on your size

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Stout Build
traits.description: If you would be slowed by heavy armor you can move as normal.

traits.name: Reach
traits.description: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

traits.name: Fury of the Small
traits.description: When you damage a creature larger than you with an attack or a spell, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage equal to your level. You regain use of this trait after a short rest.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

traits.name: Small Stealth
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

speed.name: Walking Speed
speed.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet. You can choose to increase this.

traits.name: Base Speed (30 ft.)
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet. Your base climbing and swimming speeds are half your walking speed.

traits.name: Quick (35 ft.)
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

traits.name: Speedy (40 ft.)
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

darkvision.name: Darkvision
darkvision.description: Not all species have the ability to naturally see in the dark.

traits.name: Darkvision (60 ft.)
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision (120 ft.)
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.label: Planar Ancestry
elemental.description: You have the blood of an elemental, such as a genie, in your ancestry.

traits.name: Elemental Attunement
traits.description: If you have elemental ancestry, you must take this trait. Choose one element type below.

options.name: Air
options.description: Resistance to lightning or thunder damage. Darkvision tinged white. Speak Primordial (Auran).

options.name: Earth
options.description: Know stone forming, manipulate earth, or blade ward cantrip (as bonus action PB/long rest). Speak Primordial (Terran).

options.name: Fire
options.description: Resistance to fire damage. Darkvision in red. Speak Primordial (Ignan).

options.name: Nature
options.description: Resistance to acid or poison damage. Darkvision brown/green. Speak Primordial (Giant).

options.name: Water
options.description: Resistance to cold damage. Darkvision blue. Speak Primordial (Aquan).

traits.name: Unending Breath
traits.description: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you're not incapacitated.

traits.name: Elemental Cantrip
traits.description: You know one cantrip associated with your elemental attunement.

traits.name: Elemental Strike
traits.description: When you damage a creature with an attack, you can cause the attack to deal extra damage of your elemental type. Usable Proficiency Bonus times per long rest.

traits.name: Elemental Magic
traits.description: Starting at 3rd level, cast one 1st-level spell of your element. At 5th level, cast one 2nd-level spell.

fey.name: Fey
fey.label: Planar Ancestry
fey.description: You have the blood of a fey in your ancestry, such as through elvish or gnomish heritage.

traits.name: Fey
traits.description: You are a fey creature.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a long rest in 4 hours of trance-like meditation. After each trance, gain two weapon or tool proficiencies until your next rest.

traits.name: Charm Resistance
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the charmed condition.

traits.name: Fey Cantrip
traits.description: You know dancing lights, druidcraft, friends, minor illusion, or vicious mockery.

traits.name: Fey Magic
traits.description: Starting at 3rd level, cast one spell: animal friendship, cause fear, charm person, color spray, enlarge/reduce, faerie fire, hideous laughter, or sleep.

traits.name: Greater Fey Magic
traits.description: Starting at 5th level, cast one spell: alter self, crown of madness, disorient, invisibility, mischief, or suggestion.

traits.name: Fey Step
traits.description: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Usable Proficiency Bonus times per long rest.

traits.name: Fey Step Improvement
traits.description: Starting at 3rd level, your Fey Step gains a seasonal effect (Autumn, Winter, Spring, or Summer) that can be changed after a long rest.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: As an action, change your appearance, voice, height, weight, and size between Medium and Small. Lasts until you revert or die.

traits.name: Greater Magic Resistance
traits.description: You have advantage on all saving throws against magic.

planetouched.name: Planetouched
planetouched.label: Planar Ancestry
planetouched.description: There is an immortal being in your ancestry, such as a celestial or fiend.

traits.name: Planar Attunement
traits.description: If you have planetouched ancestry, you must take this trait. Choose one attunement below.

options.name: Celestial
options.description: Spellcasting from cleric list. Choose resistance: Radiant or Necrotic (+1 pt).

options.name: Fiend
options.description: Spellcasting from warlock list. Choose resistance: Cold, Fire (+1 pt), or Lightning.

traits.name: Planar Cantrip
traits.description: You know one cantrip from the spell list matching your planar attunement.

traits.name: Planar Magic
traits.description: Starting at 3rd level, cast one 1st-level spell from your attunement's spell list.

traits.name: Greater Planar Magic
traits.description: Starting at 5th level, cast one 2nd-level spell from your attunement's spell list.

traits.name: Planar Power
traits.description: Damage matching your attunement ignores resistances. Immunity becomes resistance instead.

traits.name: Plane Strike
traits.description: When you damage a creature with an attack, deal extra damage of your attunement type equal to 1d4 × Proficiency Bonus. Usable PB times per long rest.

traits.name: Celestial Revelation
traits.description: At 3rd level, use reaction to transform for 1 minute: Necrotic Shroud (frighten), Radiant Consumption (blind), or Radiant Wings (fly). Once per long rest.

shadowborn.name: Shadowborn
shadowborn.label: Planar Ancestry
shadowborn.description: A creature from the Shadowfell or dark places is in your ancestry.

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the frightened condition.

traits.name: Shadow Cantrip
traits.description: You know chill touch, deathworking, minor illusion, or primal savagery.

traits.name: Shadow Magic
traits.description: At 3rd level, cast one 1st-level illusion or necromancy spell.

traits.name: Necrotic Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

traits.name: Greater Shadow Magic
traits.description: At 5th level, cast one 2nd-level illusion or necromancy spell.

traits.name: Close to Death
traits.description: You have advantage on death saving throws.

traits.name: Camouflage
traits.description: Advantage on Stealth checks and can hide when only lightly obscured. Usable PB times per long rest.

traits.name: Shifting
traits.description: As bonus action, assume bestial form for 1 minute gaining temp HP. Choose: Beasthide (+AC), Swiftstride (+speed), or Wildhunt (advantage on Wisdom). PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Step of Darkness
traits.description: Teleport up to 30 feet. At 3rd level, gain resistance to all damage until start of next turn. PB uses per long rest.

aquatic.name: Aquatic
aquatic.label: Bestial Ancestry
aquatic.description: You are descended from an aquatic creature such as a sea elf or triton.

traits.name: Bite or Pincers
traits.description: Your toothy maw or pincers are natural light weapons dealing 1d6 + Strength slashing damage.

traits.name: Emissary of the Sea
traits.description: You can communicate simple ideas to any Beast, Elemental, or Monstrosity with a swimming speed.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: You can breathe both air and water.

traits.name: Aquatic Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid or cold damage.

traits.name: Aquatic Cantrip
traits.description: You know shape water or acid splash.

traits.name: Swim Speed
traits.description: You have a swim speed of 30 feet provided you are not wearing medium or heavy armor.

traits.name: Defensive Feature
traits.description: When grappled, deal 1d4 × PB damage (poison, piercing spines, or another type).

traits.name: Carapace / Shell
traits.description: Base AC of 17 (Dex doesn't apply). Can't wear armor but shields work. AC becomes 18 at level 12.

flying.name: Flying
flying.label: Bestial Ancestry
flying.description: You have the blood of a flying creature like an aarakocra in your ancestry.

traits.name: Beak and Claw
traits.description: Your beak or talons are natural light weapons dealing 1d6 + Strength damage.

traits.name: Flying Cantrip
traits.description: You know gust or message.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.description: Advantage on Perception, Survival, and Investigation checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Glide
traits.description: When falling, use Reaction to glide (no fall damage, move 2ft horizontal per 1ft descent). Advantage on Jump checks.

traits.name: Limited Flight
traits.description: At 1st level, bonus action to fly your walking speed for one turn. At 5th level, fly for 10 minutes. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Wings
traits.description: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. Cannot wear medium or heavy armor.

mammalian.name: Mammalian
mammalian.label: Bestial Ancestry
mammalian.description: A mammalian creature is in your ancestry, such as a tabaxi or loxodon.

traits.name: Tooth and Nail
traits.description: Your natural weapons (bite, claws, hooves, horns) are light weapons dealing 1d6 + Strength damage.

traits.name: Traversal
traits.description: Move across difficult terrain without extra movement cost when using walking speed on ground.

traits.name: Climb Speed
traits.description: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet.

traits.name: Leap
traits.description: Your long jump is 20 feet and high jump is 10 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Roar
traits.description: As bonus action, creatures within 10ft that hear you must save or be frightened until end of next turn. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Agile Fall
traits.description: When falling 100ft or less, DC 10 Acrobatics to take no damage and land on feet.

traits.name: Prehensile Appendage
traits.description: Your tail or trunk can hold an extra light weapon.

traits.name: Prehensile Trunk
traits.description: Your trunk acts as a snorkel and can lift 5 × Strength score pounds.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: Advantage on Perception, Survival, and Investigation checks that involve smell.

traits.name: Hunter's Senses
traits.description: As an action, gain blindsight (30 ft.) until end of next turn.

traits.name: Burrow
traits.description: Bonus action to gain 10ft burrow speed for one turn. At 5th level, burrow speed is 20ft.

traits.name: Swiftness
traits.description: Double your speed for one turn in combat. Can't use again until you move 0 feet on a turn.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: Advantage on attack rolls if an ally is within 5 feet of the target and not incapacitated.

reptilian.name: Reptilian
reptilian.label: Bestial Ancestry
reptilian.description: You are descended from reptilian creature such as a lizardfolk or tortle.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour.

traits.name: Tooth and Tail
traits.description: Your bite, fangs, or tail are natural light weapons dealing 1d6 + Strength damage.

traits.name: Shell Defense
traits.description: As action, withdraw into shell for +4 AC, advantage on Str/Con saves, but prone, speed 0, disadvantage on Dex saves.

traits.name: Hungry Jaws
traits.description: Bonus action bite attack that grants temp HP equal to PB on hit. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Natural Armor
traits.description: Your AC is 13 + Dexterity modifier. Shields work as normal.

traits.name: Camouflage
traits.description: Advantage on Stealth checks and can hide when only lightly obscured. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: As bonus action, spend a hit die to heal. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Chromatophore
traits.description: As bonus action, turn invisible until start of next turn (ends if you attack or force a save). PB uses per long rest.

construct.name: Construct
construct.label: Other Ancestry
construct.description: You have a constructed nature, partially mechanical or wholly unique.

traits.name: Toxin Resilience
traits.description: Advantage on saves to avoid or end poisoned or diseased conditions.

traits.name: Vigilant Rest
traits.description: During long rest, spend 6 hours inactive but conscious and aware.

traits.name: Natural Armor
traits.description: Your AC is 13 + Dexterity modifier. Shields work as normal.

traits.name: Poison Resistance
traits.description: You are resistant to poison damage.

traits.name: Constructed Form
traits.description: You are a Construct. Don't need to eat, drink, or breathe. Immune to disease, advantage vs paralyzed, magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Built for Success
traits.description: Add d4 to one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw after seeing the roll. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Healing Machine
traits.description: Mending lets you spend a Hit Die to heal. Healing spells that normally don't affect constructs work on you.

traits.name: Integrated Protection
traits.description: +1 bonus to AC. Armor takes 1 hour to don/doff and is integrated into your body.

draconic.name: Draconic
draconic.label: Other Ancestry
draconic.description: You are descended from a dragon. Only available for dragonborn species.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: If you have draconic ancestry, you must take this trait. Choose one damage type below.

traits.name: Draconic Cantrip
traits.description: You know one cantrip from the sorcerer spell list.

traits.name: Draconic Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to your ancestry's damage type.

traits.name: Draconic Warding
traits.description: At 5th level, as action become immune to your ancestry's damage type for 1 minute. Once per long rest.

traits.name: Draconic Presence
traits.description: Advantage on Intimidation checks.

traits.name: Draconic Cry
traits.description: Bonus action cry gives you and allies advantage on attacks against enemies within 10ft who heard you. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Replace one attack with 15-foot cone, Dex save for 1d10 damage (scales to 4d10). PB uses per long rest.

psionic.name: Psionic
psionic.label: Other Ancestry
psionic.description: You have an innate knack for psionics.

traits.name: Psionic Cantrip
traits.description: You know encode thoughts, mage hand (invisible, no components), message, mind sliver, or thaumaturgy.

traits.name: Force Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to force damage.

traits.name: Psychic Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to psychic damage.

traits.name: Psionic Magic
traits.description: At 3rd level, cast one 1st-level spell: bane, catapult, floating disk, hellish rebuke, jump, magnify gravity, shield, unseen servant, or wrathful smite.

traits.name: Greater Psionic Magic
traits.description: At 5th level, cast one 2nd-level spell: detect thoughts, kinetic jaunt, levitate, mind spike, mind whip, or phantasmal force.

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.description: Advantage on saves to avoid or end charmed or frightened conditions.

traits.name: Telepathy
traits.description: Speak telepathically to any creature within 30 feet if you share a language. One creature at a time.

stout.name: Stout
stout.label: Other Ancestry
stout.description: You are exceptionally sturdy, descended from hardy ancestors.

traits.name: Hardy
traits.description: Acclimated to one extreme climate: extreme cold, extreme heat, high altitudes, or deep waters.

traits.name: Toxin Resilience
traits.description: Advantage on saves to avoid or end poisoned or diseased conditions.

traits.name: Poison Resistance
traits.description: You are resistant to poison damage.

traits.name: Natural Armor
traits.description: Your AC is 12 + Constitution modifier. Shields work as normal.

traits.name: Relentless
traits.description: When reduced to 0 HP but not killed, drop to 1 HP instead. Once per long rest.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.description: HP maximum increases by 1 per level.

traits.name: Durable
traits.description: Reaction to reduce damage by 1d12 + Con modifier. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Strong
traits.description: Advantage on Strength checks and Strength saves.

traits.name: Endurance
traits.description: Human only. Avoid gaining exhaustion if you have none. Resets on long rest.

artisan.name: Artisan
artisan.description: You come from a culture that values craftsmanship.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Artisan's Lore (0), Craftsman's Memory (1), or Tinkerer (2).

options.name: Artisan's Lore
options.description: Double PB on History checks about item origins.

options.name: Craftsman's Memory
options.description: Perfectly recall any item you've seen.

options.name: Tinkerer
options.description: Add minor clockwork effects to items you create.

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency with one artisan's tool.

traits.name: Cantrip
traits.description: You know mending, dismantle, or guidance.

traits.name: Gifted Artisan
traits.description: Add 1d4 to ability checks using artisan's tools you're proficient with.

traits.name: Skilled Artistry
traits.description: Crafting with proficient artisan's tools takes half the time.

traits.name: Skill Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency in Arcana, History, Insight, Persuasion, or Sleight of Hand.

traits.name: Quick Learner
traits.description: Gain one skill and one tool proficiency. Learning new proficiencies takes half the time.

friendly.name: Friendly
friendly.description: You come from a hospitable culture with an open heart.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Entertainer's Lore (0), Socializer (0), Empathic (1), or Peaceful Negotiator (1).

options.name: Entertainer's Lore
options.description: Double PB on History/Insight for gaming/music.

options.name: Socializer
options.description: Add 1d4 to first Persuasion/Deception with strangers.

options.name: Empathic
options.description: Advantage on Insight to discern emotions.

options.name: Peaceful Negotiator
options.description: Persuasion proficiency, advantage on non-violent conflict resolution.

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency with a gaming set, instrument, cook's utensils, or herbalism kit.

traits.name: Gifted Entertainer
traits.description: Add 1d4 to ability checks using gaming sets or instruments you're proficient with.

traits.name: Skill Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency in Acrobatics, Insight, Medicine, Performance, or Persuasion.

traits.name: Healer's Intuition
traits.description: Advantage on Medicine checks and Herbalism Kit checks.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.description: When you roll a 1 on an attack, check, or save, you can reroll and must use the new roll.

mage.name: Mage
mage.description: Arcane magic is common in the society you came from.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Arcane Training (0) or Advanced Arcane Training (2).

options.name: Arcane Training
options.description: Double PB on Arcana/History about spells and magic users.

options.name: Advanced Arcane Training
options.description: Scribe scrolls/create potions in half time, advantage on Arcana for spells.

traits.name: Cantrip
traits.description: Learn one wizard cantrip.

traits.name: Skill Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency in Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, or Religion.

traits.name: Arcane Infusion
traits.description: During long rest, infuse items with wizard cantrips. Maintain up to PB items.

traits.name: Destructive Spell
traits.description: When damaging with a spell, add 1d4 × PB to one target. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Learned Magic
traits.description: Choose one 1st-level wizard spell.

skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
skirmisher.description: You come from a background specializing in combat and ambush tactics.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Combat Awareness (0) or Trap Master (1).

options.name: Combat Awareness
options.description: If surprised, enemies don't have advantage on you.

options.name: Trap Master
options.description: Advantage on Dex/Str saves against traps.

traits.name: Finesse Training
traits.description: Add finesse property to a non-heavy, non-two-handed melee weapon.

traits.name: Skill Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency in Athletics, Insight, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival.

traits.name: Lethal Strike
traits.description: Add 1d4 × PB damage to weapon attack. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Adrenaline Rush
traits.description: Dash as bonus action, gain temp HP equal to PB. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Charge
traits.description: After Dash and 20ft movement, bonus action unarmed strike or attempt to knock prone.

traits.name: Ambush
traits.description: Deal extra 2d6 damage to creatures that haven't acted yet in combat.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: Disengage or Hide as bonus action on each turn.

streetwise.name: Streetwise
streetwise.description: You grew up in a rough environment or outside the law.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Bamboozler (1), Improviser (1), or Expert Forgery (1).

options.name: Bamboozler
options.description: Bonus action distract enemy within 10ft, add PB to attacks against them.

options.name: Improviser
options.description: Proficient with improvised weapons, deal 1d6 + Str/Dex.

options.name: Expert Forgery
options.description: Advantage on forgery and duplicate checks.

traits.name: Out of Sight
traits.description: Hide when lightly obscured by natural phenomena, advantage on those Stealth checks.

traits.name: Cantrip
traits.description: Learn one bard cantrip.

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency with gaming set, thieves' tools, disguise kit, forgery kit, or poisoner's kit.

traits.name: Skill Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency in Acrobatics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Performance, Sleight of Hand, or Stealth.

traits.name: Merge with Shadows
traits.description: At 3rd level, cast pass without trace as spell-like ability.

traits.name: Thief's Intuition
traits.description: Add 1d4 to thieves' tools checks.

traits.name: Skilled
traits.description: Give yourself advantage on proficient skill checks. PB uses per long rest. Cannot take as Rogue.

survivalist.name: Survivalist / Nomad
survivalist.description: You come from a frontier culture, skilled in survival.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Beast Tracker (1), Acclimatization (0), Survivalist (1), or Traversal (1).

options.name: Beast Tracker
options.description: Double PB on Survival to track beasts.

options.name: Acclimatization
options.description: Acclimated to one extreme climate.

options.name: Survivalist
options.description: Need half as much food and drink.

options.name: Traversal
options.description: No extra movement for difficult terrain on ground.

traits.name: Skill Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency in Animal Handling, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival.

traits.name: Skilled Tracker
traits.description: Advantage on Survival to track creatures.

traits.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
traits.description: Communicate with Beasts and Plants. Advantage on Charisma checks to influence them.

traits.name: Natural Magic
traits.description: Choose one 1st-level ranger spell.

traits.name: Creativity
traits.description: Gain advantage on a roll after seeing it but before result. PB - 1 uses per long rest.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: Advantage on Perception checks relying on hearing or sight.

theocratic.name: Theocratic
theocratic.description: The society you hail from values devotion to the gods.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Presence (0), Blessed (1), or Pious Study (1).

options.name: Presence
options.description: Add 1d4 to Persuasion/Intimidation against same religion.

options.name: Blessed
options.description: Cast guidance on self as reaction PB - 1 times per day.

options.name: Pious Study
options.description: Double PB on History/Religion about religious knowledge.

traits.name: Cantrip
traits.description: Learn one cleric cantrip.

traits.name: Skill Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency in Religion, History, Insight, Persuasion, Deception, or Medicine.

traits.name: Devout Magic
traits.description: Choose one 1st-level cleric spell.

traits.name: Religious Intuition
traits.description: Advantage on Religion checks.

traits.name: Serenity
traits.description: Advantage on saves vs charmed, frightened, and madness.

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: You were raised in a society dedicated to the arts of war.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Combat Training (0), Weaponsmith (0), or Combat Climber (0).

options.name: Combat Training
options.description: Proficiency with 3 simple weapons.

options.name: Weaponsmith
options.description: Assess opponent's weapon properties. At 3rd, identify weapon properties in 1 min.

options.name: Combat Climber
options.description: Climb with one hand occupied.

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: Advantage on saves vs frightened.

traits.name: Martial Training
traits.description: Proficiency with 3 martial weapons.

traits.name: Light Armor Training
traits.description: Proficiency with light armor.

traits.name: Medium Armor Training
traits.description: Proficiency with light and medium armor.

traits.name: Shield Training
traits.description: Proficiency with shields.

traits.name: Savage Attacks
traits.description: On melee crit, roll one extra weapon damage die.

traits.name: Targeted Strike
traits.description: Natural 19 on melee attack is a crit. PB uses per long rest.

traits.name: Ranged Weapon Expert
traits.description: Proficiency with all crossbows or firearms, ignore loading, no long range disadvantage.

waterborne.name: Waterborne
waterborne.description: You were raised to feel at home with the sea.

traits.name: Cultural Skill
traits.description: Choose: Mariner's Lore (0), Fishermen's Tales (1), or both.

options.name: Mariner's Lore
options.description: Double PB on History/Religion about the sea.

options.name: Fishermen's Tales
options.description: Double PB on Insight/Survival about the sea.

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency with carpenter's tools, navigator's tools, or vehicles (water).

traits.name: Weather Worn
traits.description: No disadvantage on Perception from precipitation, wind, mist, or fog.

traits.name: Cantrip
traits.description: You know gust or mending.

traits.name: Swim Speed
traits.description: You have a swim speed of 30 feet provided you are not wearing medium or heavy armor.

traits.name: Skill Proficiency
traits.description: Gain proficiency in Acrobatics, Athletics, Perception, Nature, Sleight of Hand, or Survival.

traits.name: Sea Legs
traits.description: Advantage on Acrobatics and checks to avoid being knocked prone (except from attacks).

prebuiltAncestries.name: Wood Elf
prebuiltAncestries.description: Swift forest-dwellers with keen senses and fey ancestry.

prebuiltAncestries.name: Mountain Dwarf
prebuiltAncestries.description: Stout mountain folk with warrior traditions.

prebuiltAncestries.name: Lightfoot Halfling
prebuiltAncestries.description: Small and nimble folk who slip away from danger.

prebuiltAncestries.name: Tiefling
prebuiltAncestries.description: Those bearing the mark of an infernal heritage.

prebuiltAncestries.name: Dragonborn
prebuiltAncestries.description: Proud dragon-blooded warriors with a devastating breath weapon.
